au.org.massive.oauth2_hpc.ssh

Class KeyCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.org.massive.oauth2_hpc.ssh.KeyCodec
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RSAPrivateKeyCodec, RSAPublicKeyCodec

    public class KeyCodec
extends java.lang.Object
    Some utilities to encode/decode key pairs in PEM format using bouncycastle

      • readPassword

        private static java.lang.String readPassword(java.lang.String prompt)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a password from the console. Used when the private key needs to be decrypted but a passphrase is either not provided or incorrect.
        Parameters:
        prompt - text to display as a password prompt
        Returns:
        the password
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Returns:
